comprehensive_overview: parallel-fastq-dump is a tool for parallelizing the download and extraction of FASTQ files from the Sequence Read Archive (SRA) in order to significantly reduce the download time.
core_features: Parallelizes the download and extraction process of FASTQ files from SRA
Improves download speed by utilizing multiple threads
Supports efficient retrieval of data from the Sequence Read Archive
Reduces the time taken for downloading large datasets
